meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or affected with struma.
meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed the patient with a strumous condition.
meanings.sent2: The strumous growth on the plant was concerning to the gardener.
meanings.sent3: The strumous cat sneezed loudly, causing everyone to laugh.
meanings.sent4: The strumous clouds in the sky foretold an impending storm.
meanings.sent5: The strumous smell of the garbage made me hold my breath.

meanings.sent1: Her strumous cough sounded like a distant thunder.
meanings.sent2: The painting had a strumous quality that captivated the viewers.
meanings.sent3: The strumous pattern on the fabric made it stand out in the store.
meanings.sent4: His strumous behavior mirrored that of a rebellious teenager.
meanings.sent5: The strumous taste of the medicine lingered in her mouth.
